1.title: The Rogue Team Rises: Part 1
1.plot: After 9 months of silence, the Rogue Team emerges from the shadows after team member Buck tries to take matters into his own hands. The AIMS team meets face to face with this other mysterious team to find out who they are and what they are after.

2.title: The Rogue Team Rises: Part 2
2.plot: After being abducted, the AIMS team faces a mysterious man who offers them a deal with an incredible payoff. The team suddenly realizes Trapper is missing and they set off to locate him in a race against time after finding a trail of his blood.

3.title: Enter the Dark Forest
3.plot: The AIMS team enters the Dark Forest to capture the Woman of the Woods but realize that the forest is the home to another mysterious creature: the Black Wolf.

4.title: The Black Wolf
4.plot: The AIMS team learns that a mysterious creature known as the Black Wolf roams the Dark Forest; a shaman reveals that the Black Wolf's presence may spell disaster for Jeff whose behavior continues to trouble the team.

5.title: Superfan Edition
5.plot: The AIMS team shares their thoughts, answers fans' biggest questions and tell some of their favorite stories from the road.

6.title: Huckleberry's Predator
6.plot: After the AIMS team is split in half, Jeff must come up with answers about the Dark Forest; while the team gets proof of the Black Wolf, Huckleberry reveals that a mysterious creature is stalking the team and finds himself in a fight for his life.

7.title: The Three Rings of the North
7.plot: After a shocking discovery, Buck heads into the Dark Forest and encounters someone from his past. Huckleberry realizes that the predator he faced off with wants revenge. The team follows a trail left by Jeff and discovers the mysterious Three Rings.

8.title: The Secret of the Little Girl
8.plot: The team discovers what Jeff was doing at the Three Rings; the team learns what Buck found on his phone; Buck heads to the Three Rings to contact the Little Girl, who seems to be the key to the Dark Forest.

9.title: The Blood Skull and Woman of the Woods
9.plot: Buck searches for the Little Girl after he makes contact with her and she vanishes; the rest of the AIMS team sneaks into a cabin looking for answers about the other team's intentions; Buck winds up face to face with the Woman of the Woods.

1.title: Wolfman of Wolfe County
1.plot: Wolfe County, Kentucky has a fresh trail of evidence that a 500 pound Wolfman is terrorizing the region. Now a group of expert hunters and trappers are using their backwoods knowledge to catch the Wolfman and make Appalachia safe once again.

2.title: Grassman of Perry County
2.plot: Residents of Perry County, Ohio have reported a 1,000 pound Grassman seen in the woods. Now a group of expert hunters and trappers are using their backwoods knowledge to catch the Grassman and make Appalachia safe once again.

3.title: Devil Dog of Logan County
3.plot: A blood-sucking Devil Dog is terrorizing a region in West Virginia. Expert hunters set out to catch the monster and make Appalachia safe once again.

4.title: Wampus Beast of Pleasants County
4.plot: The AIMS team travel to Raleigh County, West Virginia, to investigate a killer bear-canine hybrid called the "Red-Eyed Bear Beast." The team tracks the creature across treacherous terrain and rivers and attempts to capture it inside of a caldron trap.

5.title: Mothman of Mason County
5.plot: A flying Mothman appears to have returned to Mason County, West Virginia, and is terrorizing the county. Can hunters catch the monster once and for all?

6.title: Lizard Demon of Wood County
6.plot: Reports of alleged reptile-human hybrid roaming around West Virginia's Wood County are investigated by the team. Could there be a reptoid?

1.title: Kentucky Hellhound of Pike County
1.plot: The AIMS team travel to Pike County, Kentucky, to investigate a huge canine predator who is menacing the local farming community. The team meets with eyewitnesses and races to construct a giant bamboo box trap before the creature migrates for the winter.

2.title: Grafton Monster of Taylor County
2.plot: The AIMS team travel to Taylor County, West Virginia, to investigate a huge bipedal predator nicknamed the "Headless Horror." The team meets with eyewitnesses, tracks the creature, and attempts to capture it inside of a massive wooden trap.

3.title: Yahoo of Nicholas County
3.plot: The AIMS team travel to Nicholas County, West Virginia, to investigate a large Bigfoot-like creature called "The Yahoo." The team meets with eyewitnesses, tracks the beast, and attempts to capture it inside of a giant log-fall trap.

4.title: Werewolf of Webster County
4.plot: The AIMS team travel to Webster County, West Virginia, to investigate the legendary Webster Werewolf, a massive wolf-like creature with ancient mythical ties. The team meets with eyewitnesses and works to complete a pit-trap before the full moon passes.

5.title: Fire Dragon of Pocahontas County
5.plot: The AIMS team travel to Pocahontas County, West Virginia, to investigate a gigantic, aquatic reptile called the "Fire Dragon." The team meets with eyewitnesses and constructs an elaborate water trap before pursuing the creature on land and boat.

6.title: Sheepsquatch of Boone County
6.plot: The AIMS team travel to Boone County, West Virginia, to investigate a bizarre and aggressive creature called "The Sheepsquatch." The team meets with eyewitnesses and builds a custom razor wire trap before embarking upon a perilous night hunt.

7.title: Shadow Creature of Braxton County
7.plot: The AIMS team travel to Braxton County, West Virginia, to investigate a clandestine killer known as "The Shadow Creature." The team rappels cliffs and navigates the big timber as they chase the monster toward a super-sized snare trap.

8.title: Wild Bill's Bear Beast
8.plot: The AIMS team travel to Raleigh County, West Virginia, to investigate a killer bear-canine hybrid called the "Red-Eyed Bear Beast." The team tracks the creature across treacherous terrain and rivers and attempts to capture it inside of a caldron trap.

9.title: Death Cat of Cherokee County
9.plot: The AIMS team travel to Cherokee County, North Carolina, to investigate a ferocious feline called "The Cherokee Death Cat." The team works to unravel the myth surrounding the creature and attempts to capture it inside of a complex wooden trap.

10.title: Snallygaster of Preston County
10.plot: The AIMS team travel to Preston County, West Virginia, to investigate a huge flying predator called "The Snallygaster." The team encounters great danger when they invade the creature's territory and attempt to capture it inside of a large wooden box trap.

11.title: Cave Creature of Greenbrier County
11.plot: The AIMS team travel to Greenbrier County, West Virginia, to investigate a humanoid bipedal called "The Cave Creature." The team tracks the elusive creature through a twenty-mile cave system toward a series of snare traps.

12.title: Hogzilla of Hocking Hills
12.plot: The AIMS team travel to the treacherous terrain of Hocking Hills, Ohio, to investigate a huge hog-like creature called "Hogzilla." After meeting with eyewitnesses, the team races to capture the beast inside of a massive steel cage trap.

13.title: Bloodless Howler of Harrison County
13.plot: The AIMS team travel to Harrison County, West Virginia, to investigate a vicious canine-feline hybrid known as "The Bloodless Howler." The team tracks the predator toward their Asian tiger-box trap in frigid temperatures.

14.title: Grassman's Revengeance
14.plot: In the two-hour season finale, the AIMS team travel back to Perry County, Ohio, to settle an unfinished score with a massive Bigfoot-like creature. The team works to unravel the mystery of the Ohio Grassman's identity and faces their greatest danger yet.

1.title: Bigfoot of Central Kentucky
1.plot: The AIMS team heads back to Central Kentucky after a Bigfoot known as the "Squalling Savage" who locals believe is at war with another Bigfoot clan in the area.

2.title: Bigfoot of Putnam County
2.plot: Appalachian Investigators of Mysterious Sightings travel to Putnam County, WV to investigate the Chupacabra, known as the West Virginia Vampire. The team must meet with eyewitnesses and build an elaborate maze trap in an attempt to capture the creature.

3.title: Bigfoot of Eastern Kentucky
3.plot: Appalachian Investigators of Mysterious Sightings travel to Eastern Kentucky to investigate the Wildman, known as the most dangerous and aggressive Bigfoot in the region. The team searches for a missing eyewitness and builds the largest and strongest trap

4.title: Bigfoot of Lincoln County
4.plot: Appalachian Investigators of Mysterious Sightings travel to Lincoln County, WV to investigate the Hellhound who left a bad taste in their mouth after evading them last autumn.

5.title: Bigfoot of Clay County
5.plot: Appalachian Investigators of Mysterious Sightings travel to Clay County, WV to investigate the "Yahoo", who threw trees at them and destroyed their trap in Nicholas County WV, last autumn. The team must build an electrified trap to contain this Bigfoot.

6.title: Bigfoot of Washington County
6.plot: The AIMS team travels to Washington County, PA to investigate the "Dustman", thought to be the fastest and most agile Bigfoot in the region. They must build a quicksand pit trap, and repel down a cliff at night to its cave lair.

7.title: Bigfoot of Ashe County: AIMS Under Attack
7.plot: The AIMS team head to Ashe County, NC in search of "The Cherokee Devil". This Bigfoot is thought to possess mind control abilities. When Buck has an encounter with the creature the team fights back, only to have another team member fall under its spell.

8.title: Bigfoot of Ashe County: AIMS Explodes
8.plot: The AIMS team go back to Ashe County, NC to hunt the "Cherokee Devil" a savage Bigfoot that has already scarred members of the team. As the mission continues the biggest rift in AIMS history erupts and some members debate hanging up their gear for good.

9.title: Bigfoot of Ashe County Attacks!
9.plot: The AIMS team heads to Ashe County, N.C. in search of the Cherokee Devil; Buck encounters a creature; a team member falls under a creature's spell.

1.title: Stonish Giant of Harrision County
1.plot: Appalachian Investigators of Mysterious Sightings travel to Harrison County, Ohio to investigate "The Stonish Giant", a Bigfoot that Native American folklore says has a coat of fur so thick that it cannot be pierced by arrows.

2.title: Squalling Savage of Central Kentucky
2.plot: The AIMS team heads back to Central Kentucky after a Bigfoot known as the "Squalling Savage" who locals believe is at war with another Bigfoot clan in the area.

3.title: Lightning Man of Blair County
3.plot: The AIMS team heads to Blair County, PA looking for a Bigfoot known as the "Lightning Man". After meeting the eyewitnesses, the team believes that the key to this investigation may be a Native American lightning symbol hidden inside a secluded barn.

4.title: Thunder Brothers of Blair County
4.plot: After discovering a carved stone the last time they were in Blair County, PA, the AIMS team returns looking for answers. While meeting with a Bigfoot expert the team realizes that they uncovered somethign that was not meant to be unearthed.

5.title: Scariest Moments
5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

6.title: Great Fire Ape of Pendleton County
6.plot: The team heads to Pendleton County, WV after a Bigfoot that folklore says is drawn to fire.

7.title: The Ash Man of Wirt County
7.plot: The Team heads to Wirt County, WV after a Bigfoot known as the Ash Man that Huckleberry saw on his family's farm nearly 50 years ago. The team constructs their largest trap to date in order to capture the Ash Man.

8.title: Raven Mocker of Lee County
8.plot: The Team heads to Lee County, VA after a Bigfoot that the Cherokee people feared most. After devising a Raven Wing Trap, they face to face with something they cannot explain, learning that there is something truly evil haunting the forests of Virginia.

9.title: Best of Bigfoot
9.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

10.title: Raven Mocker: Back to Trapper
10.plot: The AIMS team reunites for the first time with Trapper to get his opinion on how they should take on the legendary Raven Mocker. They soon learn that their only option is to face off against the Raven Mocker.

11.title: Phantom of the Forest
11.plot: The AIMS team enters the Dark Forest to capture the Woman of the Woods. The Dark Forest has a grip around Jeff and they realize that this is the home to not only the Woman of the Woods and a Bigfoot, but another mysterious creature: the Black Wolf.

12.title: Return of the Rogue Team
12.plot: The AIMS team heads back to Perry County, OH to go after The Ohio Grassman. They soon realize they are being followed by the rogue team that has been tracking them. The AIMS team attempts to shine a light on their identity.

13.title: AIMS vs. The Rogue Team
13.plot: The AIMS team continues their mission to discover the true identity of the Rogue Team. AIMS must make a decision on whether they should carry on with this deadly game of cat and mouse or if they should finally admit defeat and back down.

imdb.plot outline: Chupacabra, Wampus Beast, Wolfman, Mothman and Grassman - with a distinctive landscape of woods, lakes and valleys, the Appalachian Mountains are a hotbed for mysterious creature sightings. The leading researchers of these shadowy figures are The Appalachian Investigators of Mysterious Sightings (AIMS). The team, founded by John "Trapper" Tice, is skilled in hunting and tracking using both traditional techniques and modern technology. Their mission is to interview witnesses, investigate the scene of the encounter, and eventually capture the creature... or prove its non-existence.
imdb.title: Mountain Monsters
plot: _Mountain Monsters_ (qv) is a show with professional hillbilly hunters that search for mysterious creatures that people have claimed to have seen in West Virginia.::Eric Cartman

Chupacabra, Wampus Beast, Wolfman, Mothman and Grassman - with a distinctive landscape of woods, lakes and valleys, the Appalachian Mountains are a hotbed for mysterious creature sightings. The leading researchers of these shadowy figures are The Appalachian Investigators of Mysterious Sightings (AIMS). The team, founded by John "Trapper" Tice, is skilled in hunting and tracking using both traditional techniques and modern technology. Their mission is to interview witnesses, investigate the scene of the encounter, and eventually capture the creature... or prove its non-existence.::Jiilo_Kim
